member.name: T:CIS285Project.MainForm
member.summary: Main user interface for the Student Grade Book application. Handles user interaction, validation, and data persistence.

member.name: M:CIS285Project.MainForm.UpdateSummary
member.summary: Updates all class summary statistics displayed in the UI, including averages and passing counts.

member.name: T:CIS285Project.Models.GradeBook
member.summary: Manages a collection of student records and provides methods for modifying students and calculating class statistics.

member.name: P:CIS285Project.Models.GradeBook.Students
member.summary: Gets the list of students in the grade book.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:CIS285Project.Models.GradeBook.AddStudent(CIS285Project.Models.StudentRecord)
member.summary: Adds a new student to the grade book.

member.name: M:CIS285Project.Models.GradeBook.UpdateStudent(System.Int32,CIS285Project.Models.StudentRecord)
member.summary: Updates an existing student at the specified index.
member.param: The index of the student to update.

member.name: M:CIS285Project.Models.GradeBook.RemoveStudent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a student from the grade book at the specified index.
member.param: The index of the student to remove.

member.name: M:CIS285Project.Models.GradeBook.CalculateClassAverage
member.summary: Calculates the average grade across all students.

member.summary: Provides functionality for saving and loading student records to and from XML files.

member.summary: Saves a list of student records to an XML file.

The list of student records to save.

member.summary: Loads student records from an XML file.
member.param: The file path of the XML file to load.
member.returns: A list of student records loaded from the file.

member.summary: Attempts to parse a string value into a nullable double.
